name: knowledgepack-docsify-setup
description: Knowledge Pack with Docsify and Decap CMS integration

scripts.start: npm run generate-nav && concurrently --kill-others --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow" "npx decap-server" "node watch-navigation.js" "docsify serve docs"
scripts.build: npm run generate-nav && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp -r docs dist/docs && cp -r admin dist/admin && cp index.html dist/404.html && cp docs/_sidebar.md dist/docs/_sidebar.md || true
scripts.preview: npm run build && npx http-server dist -p 8080
